10 pcl::PointXYZ image_processing::GetROICenter(cv::KeyPoint tomato, sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 pcloud){
11  int32_t pointstep = pcloud.point_step;
12  int32_t rowstep = pcloud.row_step;
13  pcl::PointXYZ result;
14  int32_t idx_x = ((int)tomato.pt.y) * rowstep + ((int)tomato.pt.x) * pointstep;
15  result.x = *(float *)&pcloud.data[idx_x];
16  result.y = *(float *)&pcloud.data[idx_x + 4];
17  result.z = *(float *)&pcloud.data[idx_x + 8];
18  return result;
19 }

28 void image_processing::PerceptFilterThreshold(std::string target_color, cv::Mat &img_hsv, cv::Mat &img_threshold)
29 {
30  if (target_color.compare("red") == 0)
31  {
32  cv::Mat img_threshold_2;
33  ColorThreshold th_1 = hsv_threshold_dict.at("kRed1");
34  ColorThreshold th_2 = hsv_threshold_dict.at("kRed2");
35  cv::inRange(img_hsv,
36  th_1.lower_bounds,
37  th_1.upper_bounds, img_threshold);
38  cv::inRange(img_hsv,
39  th_2.lower_bounds,
40  th_2.upper_bounds, img_threshold_2);
41  img_threshold = img_threshold | img_threshold_2;
42  }
43  else
44  {
45  ColorThreshold th = hsv_threshold_dict.at(target_color);
46  cv::inRange(img_hsv,
47  th.lower_bounds,
48  th.upper_bounds, img_threshold);
49  }
50 }

61 std::vector<cv::KeyPoint> image_processing::PerceptBlobDetection(cv::Mat &img, cv::Mat &img_threshold, cv::Mat &img_keypoints, cv::SimpleBlobDetector::Params params)
62 {
63  cv::Ptr<cv::SimpleBlobDetector> detector = cv::SimpleBlobDetector::create(params);
64  std::vector<cv::KeyPoint> keypoints;
65  detector->detect(img_threshold, keypoints);
66  cv::drawKeypoints(img, keypoints, img_keypoints,
67  cv::Scalar(250, 0, 0),
68  cv::DrawMatchesFlags::DRAW_RICH_KEYPOINTS);
69 
70 
71  return keypoints;
72 };
